name: SEED
description:
post compo version of my ludum dare:

made in 48h for the Ludum dare 34

Theme : 2 button controls AND growth

controls:

left arrow / touch left side of the screen : move left

right arrow / touch right side of the screen : move right

hold left and right arrow / touch both side of the screen : pick up items, drop items, restart.

play time: 20-40 mins

12/01/16

- added a save game (save at the end of each stage, press C on the intro to continue to the last saved stage)

- added touchscreen support: touch on the left or right (or both) side of the screen, must be played in fullscreen.
